00036 //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------
00037 // Function: EndpointDesignWidget()
00038 //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------
00039 EndpointDesignWidget::EndpointDesignWidget(LibraryInterface* lh, MainWindow* mainWnd, QWidget* parent) :
00040     TabDocument(parent, DOC_ZOOM_SUPPORT | DOC_DRAW_MODE_SUPPORT | DOC_PROTECTION_SUPPORT |
00041                         DOC_EDIT_SUPPORT, 30, 300),
00042     lh_(lh), view_(0), diagram_(0), editProvider_()
00043 {
00044     editProvider_ = QSharedPointer<GenericEditProvider>(new GenericEditProvider(EDIT_HISTORY_SIZE));
00045     diagram_ = new EndpointDesignDiagram(lh_, mainWnd, *editProvider_, this);
00046 
00047     connect(diagram_, SIGNAL(openComponent(const VLNV&)),
00048         this, SIGNAL(openComponent(const VLNV&)), Qt::UniqueConnection);
00049     connect(diagram_, SIGNAL(openSource(ProgramEntityItem*)),
00050         this, SIGNAL(openSource(ProgramEntityItem*)), Qt::UniqueConnection);
00051     connect(diagram_, SIGNAL(componentSelected(ComponentItem*)),
00052         this, SIGNAL(componentSelected(ComponentItem*)), Qt::UniqueConnection);
00053     connect(diagram_, SIGNAL(clearItemSelection()),
00054         this, SIGNAL(clearItemSelection()), Qt::UniqueConnection);
00055     
00056     view_ = new QGraphicsView(this);
00057     view_->setScene(diagram_);
00058     view_->centerOn(0, 0);
00059 
00060         QVBoxLayout* layout = new QVBoxLayout(this);
00061     layout->addWidget(view_);
00062 
00063     view_->verticalScrollBar()->setTracking(true);
00064     connect(view_->verticalScrollBar(), SIGNAL(valueChanged(int)), this, SLOT(onVerticalScroll(int)));
00065 }

00074 //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------
00075 // Function: setDesign()
00076 //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------
00077 bool EndpointDesignWidget::setDesign(VLNV const& vlnv)
00078 {
00079     // Check if the vlnv is not valid.
00080     if (!vlnv.isValid() || vlnv.getType() != VLNV::COMPONENT)
00081     {
00082         return false;
00083     }
00084 
00085     // Retrieve the model.
00086     QSharedPointer<Component> system = lh_->getModel(vlnv).staticCast<Component>();
00087 
00088     if (system == 0)
00089     {
00090         return false;
00091     }
00092 
00093     // Check that the component is actually a system.
00094         KactusAttribute::Implementation implementation = system->getComponentImplementation();
00095 
00096     if (implementation != KactusAttribute::KTS_SYS)
00097     {
00098         return false;
00099     }
00100 
00101     // Retrieve the view and check that it is hierarchical.
00102     View* view = system->findView("kts_sys_ref");
00103 
00104     if (view == 0 || !view->isHierarchical())
00105     {
00106         return false;
00107     }
00108 
00109     // Open the design to the diagram.
00110     diagram_->setDesign(system);
00111 
00112     system_ = system;
00113     designConf_ = diagram_->getDesignConfiguration();
00114 
00115     connect(diagram_, SIGNAL(contentChanged()),
00116         this, SIGNAL(contentChanged()), Qt::UniqueConnection);
00117     connect(diagram_, SIGNAL(modeChanged(DrawMode)),
00118         this, SIGNAL(modeChanged(DrawMode)), Qt::UniqueConnection);
00119 
00120     setDocumentName(system_->getVlnv()->getName() + 
00121                     " (" + system_->getVlnv()->getVersion() + ")");
00122     setDocumentType("System");
00123 
00124     // Open in unlocked mode by default only if the version is draft.
00125     setProtection(vlnv.getVersion() != "draft");
00126 
00127     return true;
00128 }

00130 //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------
00131 // Function: setZoomLevel()
00132 //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------
00133 void EndpointDesignWidget::setZoomLevel(int level)
00134 {
00135     TabDocument::setZoomLevel(level);
00136 
00137     double newScale = getZoomLevel() / 100.0;
00138     QMatrix oldMatrix = view_->matrix();
00139     view_->resetMatrix();
00140     view_->translate(oldMatrix.dx(), oldMatrix.dy());
00141     view_->scale(newScale, newScale);
00142 
00143     emit zoomChanged();
00144 }

00146 //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------
00147 // Function: fitInView()
00148 //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------
00149 void EndpointDesignWidget::fitInView()
00150 {
00151     QRectF itemRect = diagram_->itemsBoundingRect();
00152     float scaleX = std::max(0, view_->width() - 10 - view_->verticalScrollBar()->width()) / itemRect.width();
00153     float scaleY = std::max(0, view_->height() - 10 - view_->horizontalScrollBar()->height()) / itemRect.height();
00154 
00155     int scaleLevel = int(std::min(scaleX, scaleY) * 10) * 10;
00156     setZoomLevel(scaleLevel);
00157 
00158     view_->centerOn(itemRect.center());
00159 }

00169 //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------
00170 // Function: getSupportedDrawModes()
00171 //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------
00172 unsigned int EndpointDesignWidget::getSupportedDrawModes() const
00173 {
00174     if (view_->isInteractive())
00175     {
00176         return (MODE_SELECT | MODE_CONNECT | MODE_DRAFT);
00177     }
00178     else
00179     {
00180         return MODE_SELECT;
00181     }
00182 }

00184 //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------
00185 // Function: save()
00186 //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------
00187 bool EndpointDesignWidget::save()
00188 {
00189     // First save the design hierarchy.
00190     if (!diagram_->saveHierarchy())
00191     {
00192         return false;
00193     }
00194 
00195     // Create the design.
00196     QSharedPointer<Design> design;
00197 
00198     if (designConf_)
00199     {
00200         design = diagram_->createDesign(designConf_->getDesignRef());
00201     }
00202     else
00203     {
00204         design = diagram_->createDesign(system_->getHierRef());
00205     }
00206 
00207     if (design == 0)
00208     {
00209         return false;
00210     }
00211 
00212     // Write the files.
00213     if (designConf_)
00214     {
00215         lh_->writeModelToFile(designConf_);
00216     }
00217 
00218     lh_->writeModelToFile(design);
00219     lh_->writeModelToFile(system_);
00220 
00221     return TabDocument::save();
00222 }

00224 //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------
00225 // Function: keyPressEvent()
00226 //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------
00227 void EndpointDesignWidget::keyPressEvent(QKeyEvent* event)
00228 {
00229     // If the document is protected, skip all delete events.
00230     if (isProtected())
00231     {
00232         return;
00233     }
00234 
00235     if (event->key() == Qt::Key_Delete)
00236     {
00237         if (diagram_->selectedItems().empty())
00238         {
00239             return;
00240         }
00241 
00242         QGraphicsItem* selected = diagram_->selectedItems().first();
00243 
00244         if (selected->type() == MappingComponentItem::Type)
00245         {
00246             MappingComponentItem* item = static_cast<MappingComponentItem*>(selected);
00247 
00248             if (!item->isMapped())
00249             {
00250                 QSharedPointer<MappingCompDeleteCommand> cmd(new MappingCompDeleteCommand(item));
00251 
00252                 connect(cmd.data(), SIGNAL(componentInstantiated(ComponentItem*)),
00253                     diagram_, SIGNAL(componentInstantiated(ComponentItem*)), Qt::UniqueConnection);
00254                 connect(cmd.data(), SIGNAL(componentInstanceRemoved(ComponentItem*)),
00255                     diagram_, SIGNAL(componentInstanceRemoved(ComponentItem*)), Qt::UniqueConnection);
00256 
00257                 editProvider_->addCommand(cmd);
00258                 emit clearItemSelection();
00259             }
00260         }
00261         else if (selected->type() == ProgramEntityItem::Type)
00262         {
00263             ProgramEntityItem* item = static_cast<ProgramEntityItem*>(selected);
00264 
00265             if (!item->isImported())
00266             {
00267                 QSharedPointer<ProgramEntityDeleteCommand> cmd(new ProgramEntityDeleteCommand(item));
00268 
00269                 connect(cmd.data(), SIGNAL(componentInstantiated(ComponentItem*)),
00270                     diagram_, SIGNAL(componentInstantiated(ComponentItem*)), Qt::UniqueConnection);
00271                 connect(cmd.data(), SIGNAL(componentInstanceRemoved(ComponentItem*)),
00272                     diagram_, SIGNAL(componentInstanceRemoved(ComponentItem*)), Qt::UniqueConnection);
00273 
00274                 editProvider_->addCommand(cmd);
00275                 emit clearItemSelection();
00276             }
00277         }
00278         else if (selected->type() == ApplicationItem::Type)
00279         {
00280             ApplicationItem* item = static_cast<ApplicationItem*>(selected);
00281 
00282             if (!item->isImported())
00283             {
00284                 QSharedPointer<ApplicationDeleteCommand> cmd(new ApplicationDeleteCommand(item));
00285 
00286                 connect(cmd.data(), SIGNAL(componentInstantiated(ComponentItem*)),
00287                     diagram_, SIGNAL(componentInstantiated(ComponentItem*)), Qt::UniqueConnection);
00288                 connect(cmd.data(), SIGNAL(componentInstanceRemoved(ComponentItem*)),
00289                     diagram_, SIGNAL(componentInstanceRemoved(ComponentItem*)), Qt::UniqueConnection);
00290 
00291                 editProvider_->addCommand(cmd);
00292                 emit clearItemSelection();
00293             }
00294         }
00295         else if (selected->type() == PlatformComponentItem::Type)
00296         {
00297             PlatformComponentItem* item = static_cast<PlatformComponentItem*>(selected);
00298 
00299             if (!item->isImported())
00300             {
00301                 QSharedPointer<PlatformCompDeleteCommand> cmd(new PlatformCompDeleteCommand(item));
00302 
00303                 connect(cmd.data(), SIGNAL(componentInstantiated(ComponentItem*)),
00304                         diagram_, SIGNAL(componentInstantiated(ComponentItem*)), Qt::UniqueConnection);
00305                 connect(cmd.data(), SIGNAL(componentInstanceRemoved(ComponentItem*)),
00306                         diagram_, SIGNAL(componentInstanceRemoved(ComponentItem*)), Qt::UniqueConnection);
00307 
00308                 editProvider_->addCommand(cmd);
00309                 emit clearItemSelection();
00310             }
00311         }
00312         else if (selected->type() == EndpointItem::Type)
00313         {
00314             // Allow deletion only if the parent endpoint stack is editable.
00315             EndpointStack* stack = static_cast<EndpointStack*>(selected->parentItem());
00316 
00317             if (stack->isEditable())
00318             {
00319                 QSharedPointer<QUndoCommand> cmd(new EndpointDeleteCommand(static_cast<EndpointItem*>(selected)));
00320                 editProvider_->addCommand(cmd);
00321                 emit clearItemSelection();
00322             }
00323         }
00324         else if (selected->type() == EndpointConnection::Type)
00325         {
00326             // Delete the connection.
00327             QSharedPointer<QUndoCommand> cmd(new EndpointConnectionDeleteCommand(
00328                 static_cast<EndpointConnection*>(selected)));
00329             editProvider_->addCommand(cmd);
00330             emit clearItemSelection();
00331         }
00332         else if (selected->type() == SystemColumn::Type)
00333         {
00334             // Ask a confirmation if the user really wants to delete the entire column if it is not empty.
00335             SystemColumn* column = static_cast<SystemColumn*>(selected);
00336 
00337             bool del = true;
00338 
00339             if (!column->isEmpty())
00340             {
00341                 QMessageBox msgBox(QMessageBox::Warning, QCoreApplication::applicationName(),
00342                                     tr("The column is not empty. Do you want to "
00343                                     "delete the column and all of its contents?"),
00344                                     QMessageBox::Yes | QMessageBox::No, this);
00345 
00346                 if (msgBox.exec() == QMessageBox::No)
00347                 {
00348                     del = false;
00349                 }
00350             }
00351 
00352             // Delete the column if requested.
00353             if (del)
00354             {
00355                 QSharedPointer<QUndoCommand> cmd(new SystemColumnDeleteCommand(diagram_->getColumnLayout(),
00356                                                                                column));
00357                 editProvider_->addCommand(cmd);
00358                 emit clearItemSelection();
00359             }
00360         }
00361     }
00362 }

00364 //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------
00365 // Function: onVerticalScroll()
00366 //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------
00367 void EndpointDesignWidget::onVerticalScroll(int y)
00368 {
00369     QPointF pt(0.0, y);
00370     QMatrix mat = view_->matrix().inverted();
00371     diagram_->onVerticalScroll(mat.map(pt).y());
00372 }
